description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Le Livre de Ferdinand Colomb. Revue critique des allégations proposées contre son authenticité [in a work by Henry Harrisse entitled “Fernand Colomb, sa vie, ses œuvres”], etc. (Extrait du Bulletin de la Société de Géographie de Paris.)" Author: AVEZAC-MACAYA, Marie Armand Pascal d'. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.eee.19." Page: 11 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1873 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000151902 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
